com.io7m.changelog.core.CChangelog

  • Packages that use CChangelog 
    Package Description
    com.io7m.changelog.core
    Core types.
    com.io7m.changelog.text
    Functions for serializing changelogs to plain text.
    com.io7m.changelog.xom
    Functions for serializing changelogs to XML and XHTML, and parsing changelogs from XML with XOM.
